attributes.action: Offer EU passports to UK citizens who voted remain!
attributes.additional_details: 52 leave 48 remain! Only 72% turn out! Problems with people being able to register to vote and proxy vote! Lies exposed from leave camp minutes after the result!
attributes.background: I voted remain as I am a EU citizen! I have always been and I want to be. I do not think this should be taken away from me or anyone just because less than half the population want the UK to leave the EU!
